Name: Flaming Thunderer
About the game: Flaming Thunderer is an action-platformer with adventure elements. Darkness has overtaken your village, monsters have come to your lands. You have to take on the role of a demigod who decided to fight back these creatures and liberate their lands. Take control of your powerful hammer and fight back against these monsters with it. But be careful, there is danger waiting for you on every corner. An unforgettable journey through the occupied lands awaits you! Explore interesting locations, fight various monsters with the help of unique weapons. Carefully explore the locations and don't fall into traps. And also be ready to save those in need and do not refuse to help them. Ultimately, win and erase the darkness that hangs over your lands! Game Features: - Nice pixel graphics - Exploration of the world - Lots of levels
